SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.achievements

Class AchievementService

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.achievements.AchievementService
public class AchievementService extends Object
Minimal achievements service for: - ADRENALINE_RUSH: sprint for 30 seconds (per-level accumulation) - STAMINA_MASTER: finish a level without ever hitting 0 stamina - LEVEL_1_COMPLETE - LEVEL_2_COMPLETE Persists unlocks and sprint time using LibGDX Preferences.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    AchievementService.Listener
    Consumers (e.g., toast UI) can subscribe to be notified on unlocks.
